{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Stadium of the Sacred Flame|It|The Stadium of the Sacred Flame}} is considered the core landmark of Natlan, and houses a continually burning fire called the [[Sacred Flame]].</p>}} 

The stadium is the site of the [[Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame]], a tournament in which members of the [[Natlan/Culture#Tribes of Natlan|six tribes]] compete to select the nation's strongest warriors.<ref>YouTube: [https://youtu.be/nyI9wCt6su0 Genshin Impact Version 5.0 Special Program]</ref>
